name: Hidden Weapons
Lore: 'Boba Fett''s Mandalorian armor was so versatile that his opponents never knew what to expect.',
Text: 'If Boba Fett, or your character with Mandalorian Armor is present during the weapons phase of a battle, target one opponent''s character present. Draw Destiny: (0-1) no effect (2-3) character immediately captured (4-5) character is hit (6+) character immediately lost.',
